name: Avengina
overview: Avengina is a realtime 3D graphics engine and one of a currently few Java applets which access the OpenGL as their graphics API. The appearance of the avatar is similar to a game engine, but Avengina is being designed and optimized for presentation purposes within a webbrowser.
